Welcome

At Prince of Tarts we innovate and deliver the highest quality baked goods. The process of blending fresh ingredients with our passion has shaped the bakery into what it is today. Recipes are derived from years of trial and error. It is with love and care that we create such desirables. We appreciate the support from friends, family and loyal clients over the years. We will maintain our reputation as the best.
